# ğŸ¬ YTGet GUI â€” YouTube Downloader

**YTGet GUI** is a sleek, user-friendly desktop application built with Python and PySide6 to help you download YouTube videos, playlists, and music effortlessly using **yt-dlp**. This Windows `.exe` version is portable and standalone â€” no Python installation required.

## âœ¨ Features

### ğŸ–¥ï¸ Interface
- ğŸ¯ **Clean Qt GUI** â€” Intuitive layout with dark-friendly visuals
- ğŸ›‘ **Cancel Anytime** â€” Gracefully stop downloads at any moment
- ğŸ”’ **Offline Capable** â€” No need for Python or external installations

### ğŸ“¥ Download Options
- ğŸ“¹ **Multiple Formats** â€” Download in resolutions from 480p to 8K
- ğŸµ **MP3 Mode** â€” High-quality audio extraction with embedded thumbnails and metadata
- ğŸ“„ **Subtitles** â€” Auto-fetch subtitles (multiple languages supported)
- ğŸ“‚ **Playlist Support** â€” Download entire playlists in audio or video mode

### ğŸ”§ Advanced Features
- âš™ï¸ **Persistent Settings** â€” All settings saved to `config.json` between sessions
- ğŸš€ **Improved Playlist Support** â€” Reverse order, select items, track with archive
- âœ‚ï¸ **Clip Extraction** â€” Download video portions by start/end time
- â­ï¸ **SponsorBlock** â€” Skip sponsored content, intros, and outros
- ğŸ§© **Chapters Handling** â€” Embed or split videos based on chapters
- ğŸ¼ **YouTube Music Metadata** â€” Accurate music info and album data

### ğŸ›  Functionality
- ğŸŒ **Proxy Support** â€” Configure proxies for downloading
- ğŸ“… **Date Filter** â€” Download videos uploaded after a certain date
- ğŸ§ª **Custom FFmpeg Args** â€” Add advanced arguments for power users
- ğŸ”Š **Audio Normalization** â€” Uniform audio volume for all downloads
- ğŸ—ƒ **Channel Organization** â€” Auto-sort videos into uploader folders
- âš¡ **Performance Enhancements** â€” Smart rate limiting and retry logic

## ğŸ§° How to Use

1. ğŸ“¦ Extract the downloaded `.zip` file  
2. â–¶ï¸ Launch `YTGet.exe`  
3. ğŸ”— Paste a YouTube URL  
4. ğŸšï¸ Select format (e.g., 1080p MKV or MP3)  
5. â¬‡ï¸ Click **â• Add to Queue**
6. â¬‡ï¸ Click **â–¶ï¸ Start Queue**

---

## ğŸ“ Output

- âœ… Clean filenames: `%(title)s.ext`  
- ğŸµ Audio downloads include:
  - Embedded album art (from thumbnail)
  - Metadata tags (artist, title, etc.)
  - Subtitles (if available)

---

## ğŸ§© Format Options

| Format           | Description                                     |
|------------------|-------------------------------------------------|
| ğŸï¸ 480pâ€“2160p     | MKV video with merged best audio                |
| ğŸµ MP3 Audio      | High-quality audio with tags and thumbnails     |
| ğŸ“ƒ MP3 Playlist   | Batch audio extraction from playlists           |

---

## ğŸ”’ Cookies Support

To download **age-restricted** or **private** content:

1. Export cookies using a browser extension like [Get cookies.txt](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/get-cookiestxt/lgmpjfekhdgcmpcpnmlhkfkfjdkpmoec)  
2. Place the file at:

_internal/cookies.txt


---

## âš™ï¸ Requirements

- âœ… No installation needed â€” just unzip and run  
- ğŸªŸ Windows 10 or later (64-bit)

---

## ğŸ”§ Development Setup 

### Prerequisites

- [Python](https://www.python.org/downloads/)
- [FFmpeg and FFprobe](https://www.ffmpeg.org/download.html) (Add to path or source folder)

### Setup

1. **Clone the repository**
   ```bash
   git clone https://github.com/ErfanNamira/ytget-gui.git
   ```

2. **Create & activate virtual environment**
    ```bash
    python -m venv venv
    source venv/bin/activate   # on Linux/Mac
    venv\Scripts\activate      # on Windows
    ```

2. **Install dependencies**
   ```bash
    pip install -r requirements.txt
   ```

4. **Run the app**
   ```bash
   python -m ytget
   ```
